EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-02-15-Q1 Town Hall.EMAIL-Invite #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Town Hall Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, As you saw in our January Monthly Newsletter <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4317]]>, Turbonomic is had a recent valuation at $800M in our last round of funding, and we're only going to continue to grow. We are excited about the opportunity for our partners to grow with us!
Our annual Partner Town Hall Meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> is this week on Wednesday, February 15th at 11:00 AM EST is an opportunity for you hear more about our strategy for how you, as partners, can grow with us. If you haven't already done so, be sure to reserve <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> your spot today! I look forward to seeing you on the call,
Sean Finnegan Vice President of Channel Sales
